name: DIVYAJYOTI SEVASHRAM

address: gkv-91, home shanti home , gatikrushna villa

briefDescription: working for the welfare of the rural and poor people in different fields like health, education, awareness, women, children, aged etc. We are having an Orphanage Home with a strength of 45 children. They are given education in schools and with that they are given health treatment in every week. With that we organise competitions (Talent shows) for the children of school level in different sectors. Many students are provided computer education and different programmes are organised in education sector. Health Check Camps, Awareness Programmes, Blood Donation Camp, International  Day  The organisation has also conducted education programmes for the  for the drop outs and they were inspired to give exams after dropping out from schools
